properties.name: Americamp in Ashland
properties.description: Posted by JoegrantNot fancy, but we bring our own excitement wherever we go. Just a campground. . . not far from horrendous traffic jams on I-95. Never saw so many cheeky squirrels. Some gnawed our tires!

properties.name: Billings
properties.description: Posted by JoegrantThey had to put something in the middle of nowhere and it\'s Billings.

properties.description: Posted by JoegrantHad to stop here to get annual chassis lube, adjustments done at manufacturer, Spartan

properties.name: Chicago
properties.description: Posted by JoegrantHot running water & indoor plumbing. Ahh! We stayed here in a ritzy hotel and even wore grown-up clothes.

properties.name: Cincinnati
properties.description: Posted by JoegrantInterview ad agency clients

properties.name: Coeur d'Alene
properties.description: Posted by JoegrantLovely, not unlike a Swiss mountain lake.

properties.name: Coram,near Glacier NP
properties.description: Posted by JoegrantMore drizzle than we wanted but Glacier park was beautiful anyway.

properties.description: Posted by Joegrant

properties.name: Des Moines
properties.description: Posted by JoegrantQuick stop so we could say we were here once.

properties.name: Durango CO
properties.description: Posted by JoegrantBest train trip ever!

properties.name: Ennis
properties.description: Posted by JoegrantTerrific views of the mountains from our site. Nifty little western town not far from Virginia City. But all the silver is gone!

properties.name: Funnel cloud 5/6/09 !
properties.description: Posted by JoegrantYikes! During a tornado warning we were alerted by a TV news crew looking for eyewitnesses that a twister came within 1/4 mile of us. We never saw or heard it. Duh.

properties.name: Goodland KS
properties.description: Posted by JoegrantWorld\'s largest Van Gogh sets the cultural tone here

properties.name: Grand Rapids
properties.description: Posted by JoegrantBusiness stop

properties.name: Hagerstown MD
properties.description: Posted by Joegrant1 nite stand. All we did here is sleep. ZZZZZZZZZZZZ

properties.name: Indianapolis
properties.description: Posted by JoegrantJust an overnight on the way to Louisville for more meetings. Did have dinner w/ friends - lots of laughs.

properties.name: Joe & Lisa's Winter Home
properties.description: Posted by JoegrantÂ We live here during the winter months in an appliance box in a dark corner of the parking garage, subsisting on coconuts and the odd beached fish. Look carefully at the photo and you\'ll see us waving.

properties.name: Lewiston Clarkston
properties.description: Posted by JoegrantUnbelievably hot, almost 110 most of the time here. Except for hooking up with an old friend, most disappointing place on our trip so far.

properties.name: Louisville
properties.description: Posted by JoegrantBusiness for several days

properties.name: Lowe's Campground
properties.description: Posted by JoegrantNo racing while we\'re here, thank God. Quiet, even though we could spit on the track from where we are.

properties.name: Madison
properties.description: Posted by Joegrant1 night here to visit cousins on the way to business in MI.

properties.name: Medora
properties.description: Posted by JoegrantCross country driving now for next appointment. Medora theater a nice if hokey spectacle in the hills.

properties.name: Moab UT

properties.name: Motorcoach sleeping area
properties.description: Posted by JoegrantÂ On a pond and surrounded by alligators(no kidding), pit bulls, and security cameras, this is where we launch from on journeys into the unknown. Oh, and watch out for the red ant nests, too.

properties.name: New Stanton PA
properties.description: Posted by JoegrantHome base for couple of days in Pittsburgh. Saw Strip District (not what you think), Heinz Museum, old friends (they weren\'t old last time we saw them...). Lived here for 5 yrs in 80s - lots of things have changed.

properties.name: Pecan Park RV
properties.description: Posted by JoegrantA quick overnight stay on the way to Charlotte. Awakened very early - see the airport?

properties.name: Polson - Flathead Lake
properties.description: Posted by JoegrantGorgeous scenery in this part of Idaho. We love it!

properties.name: Streetsboro - Cleveland OH
properties.description: Posted by JoegrantVisited cousins of questionable descent, ate pizza & corned beef, spent day at Rock \'n Roll Hall of Fame - it was GREAT - & explored a few old haunts. Lived here 7 years in Chagrin Falls & Solon.

properties.name: W. Yellowstone
properties.description: Posted by JoegrantCan\'t get enough of Yellowstone. Saw grizzlies, cubs, bison, elk and amazing geothermal spots. Everyone should go here once.
